metadata.title: CVE-2023-41886 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenRefine is a powerful free, open source tool for working with messydata. Prior to version 3.7.5, an arbitrary file read vulnerability allowsany unauthenticated user to read a file on a server. Version 3.7.5 fixesthis issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41886` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openrefine - 3.7.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openrefine package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.8-1').
